mapper.select: SELECT id id, deliverer_id delivererId, money_changed moneyChanged, changed_reason changedReason, fee fee, update_time updateTime, operator operator, create_time createTime, remark remark, auditor auditor, audit_time auditTime FROM deliverer_wallet_detail WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deliverer_wallet_detail ( deliverer_id, money_changed, changed_reason, fee, update_time, operator, create_time, remark, auditor, audit_time, id ) VALUES ( #{delivererId}, #{moneyChanged}, #{changedReason}, #{fee}, #{updateTime}, #{operator}, #{createTime}, #{remark}, #{auditor}, #{auditTime}, #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE deliverer_wallet_detail SET deliverer_id = #{delivererId} , money_changed = #{moneyChanged} , changed_reason = #{changedReason} , fee = #{fee} , update_time = #{updateTime} , operator = #{operator} , create_time = #{createTime} , remark = #{remark} , auditor = #{auditor} , audit_time = #{auditTime} , id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id}
